EmailTemplate.name: 4.2.4b Autumn RCA/Grad payroll notification email
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification of Payment for NCS: Real Challenge Action and Graduation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
Many thanks for taking on the role of {!Job_placement__c.Role__c} on the NCS: Real Challenge Action (RCA) and (if applicable) NCS: Graduations days.
The total gross pay for your work on {!Job_placement__c.Assignment_end_date__c} will be {!Job_placement__c.Total_gross_pay__c} for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}. This will be subject to tax and NI deductions. You will receive your pay for this on 16 December 2014.
On your payslip (sent via email on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}), you will see the total amount which you will receive.
Due to new auto-enrolment legislation, employees of The Challenge, including seasonal staff, may be enrolled in a workplace pension scheme. This is a way of saving for your retirement that's arranged by your employer. For further information, please go to www.gov.uk/workplace-pensions. Further information about workplace pensions and how to opt-out can be found on the staffing website under FAQs.
If you have any questions, please contact your staffing associate. Please quote the email reference number in any correspondence.
Yours sincerely,
NCS with The Challenge {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c} CR 4.2.4b
